langmissing.resdesc: Add the missing OPF xml:lang attribute
langmissing.ruledesc: The language must be specified (xml:lang in OPF package)
langmissing.testdesc: Ensures the OPF XML language is provided

metadatadeprecated.testdesc: Checks that no deprecated metadata is used

metadatainvalid.resdesc: Use one of the metadata values defined by schema.org
metadatainvalid.ruledesc: '{{name}}' metadata must be set to one of the expected values

metadataprintpagenumbers.resdesc: Add a page list to the Navigation Document
metadataprintpagenumbers.ruledesc: When the accessibility feature 'printPageNumbers' is declared, the Navigation Document should include a page list
metadataprintpagenumbers.testdesc: Accessibility feature 'printPageNumbers' is declared but page list is missing

metadataviolation.resdesc: Add a '{{name}}' metadata property to the Package Document

missingpagebreakviolation.resdesc: Ensure page list includes all page breaks ({{ref}})

missingpagebreakviolation.testdesc: Ensures the page list is ordered relative to page breaks ({{ref}})

orderpagelistviolation.resdesc: Order page list items to match page breaks ({{ref}})
orderpagelistviolation.ruledesc: Publication page list must be in the same order as page breaks ({{ref}})
orderpagelistviolation.testdesc: Ensures the page list is ordered relative to page breaks ({{ref}})

ordertocviolation.resdesc: Order the Table Of Contents items ({{ref}})
ordertocviolation.ruledesc: TOC must match the publication reading order ({{ref}})
ordertocviolation.testdesc: Ensures the publication TOC is ordered ({{ref}})

pagesourceviolation.resdesc: Add a 'dc:source' metadata property to the Package Document
pagesourceviolation.ruledesc: Publications with page breaks must declare the 'dc:source' metadata
pagesourceviolation.testdesc: Ensures the source of page breaks is identified

titleviolation.resdesc: Add a 'dc:title' metadata property to the Package Document
titleviolation.testdesc: Ensures the EPUB has a title
